response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would greatly benefit you as well. We understand its worth to you is $12,000, and considering its quality and uniqueness, we are offering it to you at a special price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive price. We hope you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
